COMMENT_TX: $Brandon Inge took the ball off his chest, picked it up and hurried his throw to HP; the ball sailed wide up the 1B line for the first error; he moved into foul territory after the throw and Rolen ran into him after rounding 3B; Inge was called for obstruction for the second error and Rolen allowed to score

$in the top of the first, Kenny Rogers pitched with a brown substance on the heel of his pitching hand; Cardinal manager Tony LaRussa complained to the umpires; the umpires talked with Rogers and Tigers manager Jim Leyland; Rogers washed his hands before the second inning
$Joel Zumaya made an ill-advised throw to 3B and it sailed past Brandon Inge down the line in foul territory
$this game delayed one day by rain
$Curtis Granderson slipped and fell on the wet field
$Tigers pitchers made an error in each of the five games

$the swing for strike two on Albert Pujols was called by 1B umpire Tim McClelland; Pujols flipped his bat in the air and failed to catch it; HP umpire John Hirschbeck called Pujols out on the next pitch with a big motion and McClelland stared at Pujols as the latter walked back to and went in the dugout
